name: elm-spa
description: a package for building single-page applications!

scripts.build: npm link && (cd cli && npm run build)
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run example
scripts.build:example: npm run build && (cd examples/docs && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.examples:docs: (cd examples/docs && npm install && npm run dev)
scripts.examples:complex: (cd examples/complex && npm install && npm run dev)

author: Ryan Haskell-Glatz
